chapter.title: WeeChat
chapter.para: WeeChat is a fast and extensible IRC client.

section.title: Basic Usage
section.para: By default, the module creates a systemd unit which runs the chat client in a detached screen session.
This can be done by enabling the weechat service:
The service is managed by a dedicated user named weechat in the state directory /var/lib/weechat.
